statements: SELECT * FROM livestock_reproductive_data;
SELECT id, animal_id, pregnancy_status FROM livestock_reproductive_data WHERE pregnancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM livestock_reproductive_data ORDER BY estrus_cycle_start_date DESC;
SELECT animal_id, estrus_cycle_start_date, estrus_cycle_end_date FROM livestock_reproductive_data WHERE animal_id = 3;
SELECT id, animal_id, pregnancy_status FROM livestock_reproductive_data WHERE estrus_cycle_end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM livestock_reproductive_data WHERE pregnancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT animal_id, estrus_cycle_start_date, estrus_cycle_end_date FROM livestock_reproductive_data ORDER BY estrus_cycle_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_reproductive_data WHERE animal_id = 5 AND pregnancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, animal_id, estrus_cycle_start_date, estrus_cycle_end_date FROM livestock_reproductive_data WHERE estrus_cycle_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_pregnant FROM livestock_reproductive_data WHERE pregnancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM livestock_data WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT estrus_cycle_start_date, pregnancy_status FROM livestock_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT animal_id, breeding_date FROM breeding_records WHERE record_id > 100 ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_data WHERE pregnancy_status = 'Pregnant';
SELECT animal_id, sire_id FROM breeding_records WHERE breeding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM livestock_data WHERE pregnancy_status = 'Pregnant';
SELECT animal_id, estrus_cycle_end_date FROM livestock_data WHERE estrus_cycle_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT animal_id, COUNT(*) as breeding_count FROM breeding_records GROUP BY animal_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT livestock_data.animal_id, breeding_records.breeding_date FROM livestock_data INNER JOIN breeding_records ON livestock_data.animal_id = breeding_records.animal_id;
SELECT * FROM livestock_data WHERE pregnancy_status = 'Not Pregnant' ORDER BY estrus_cycle_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5
SELECT name, age FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Angus'
SELECT id, breed FROM Livestock WHERE age < 3
SELECT * FROM Livestock ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, age, breed FROM Livestock WHERE estrus_cycle_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, breed FROM Livestock WHERE estrus_cycle_status = TRUE ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM EstrusCycles WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, status, due_date FROM Livestock l JOIN PregnancyStatus p ON l.id = p.livestock_id WHERE status = 'Pregnant' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT id, MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Livestock GROUP BY id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM livestock
SELECT name, breed FROM livestock WHERE is_pregnant = TRUE
SELECT id, name, breed FROM livestock ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM breeding_history WHERE breeding_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, status FROM livestock INNER JOIN pregnancy_status ON livestock.id = pregnancy_status.livestock_id
SELECT * FROM livestock WHERE breed = 'Holstein'
SELECT name, estrus_cycle_status FROM livestock WHERE is_pregnant = TRUE
SELECT livestock.name, breeding_history.breeding_date FROM livestock JOIN breeding_history ON livestock.id = breeding_history.livestock_id
SELECT livestock.name, pregnancy_status.status, pregnancy_status.test_date FROM livestock JOIN pregnancy_status ON livestock.id = pregnancy_status.livestock_id
SELECT livestock.name, estrus_cycle.start_date, estrus_cycle.end_date FROM livestock JOIN estrus_cycle ON livestock.id = estrus_cycle.livestock_id
SELECT * FROM livestock_info;
SELECT id, animal_type FROM livestock_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM breeding_records ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT animal_id, health_condition FROM health_records WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM breeding_center;
SELECT * FROM livestock_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT animal_type, pregnancy_status FROM livestock_info WHERE estrus_cycle_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM breeding_center ORDER BY center_location DESC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM owner_details WHERE owner_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT breeding_date, breeding_type FROM breeding_records WHERE animal_id IN (SELECT id FROM livestock_info WHERE animal_type = 'Cow');
